::: With a burst that shook the battlefeild, the bomb exploded sending a 
backdraft into the Maximal bridge and base :::

::: HELL BEAST, now with his entire face plate melted away and his shoulder 
armor ripped apart ::: At last, victory!

::: He raises his arms above his head, to praise his team for there 
outstanding courage, bravery, and cunning. Thank you all! :::

~~~~~~~~~~

::: MEGATRON, now in his new body buzzes into a covered area, observing the 
explosion ::: 

::: Megatron ::: Hmm. ...very interesting. If I can get to HELL BEAST...

::: he disguises his voice to the snotty drone voice :::

::: MEGATRON ::: Then I could ruin Hell Beast for good!
